metadata.dc:author: Honrubia, V
Hoffman, L
Marco, J
Lee, W
metadata.dc:description: We have studied the vestibular efferent fibers pathway, after scratching the peripheral vestibular receptors and horseradish peroxidase injection, and TMB or DAB processing. We have proved the existence of a differentiated bundle in the main vestibular pathway, this bundle crosses the areas where the efferent somas have been situated, some of this fibers have been seen crossing the midline. It has not been possible to connect the efferent somas with the fibers.
metadata.dc:title: Estudio neuroanat√≥mico del sistema eferente vestibular III: Origen y recorrido de los axones.
[A neuroanatomical study of the vestibular efferent system, III: the origin and pathway of the axons].
